A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Every opportunity they have to do something really cool in this film is squandered.  Screen time that could have been used for Kylo vs Luke is dedicated to porgs and other dopey slapstick bits.  Characters advance in no meaningful way.  All returning storylines are basically reset for some reason.  What were they thinking with this?  Episode 9 better come out and immediately say \"that was all just a dream\"\, because Last Jedi is a nightmare for any longtime fan.
